info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bergen, Westchester and Rockland Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orangeburg, or over Tappan, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Ossining, Tarrytown, Mount Kisco, Dobbs Ferry, Nyack, Tappan, Greenwich, Pearl River, Norwood, Hawthorne, Orangeburg, Upper Nyack, Bedford and Yorktown Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut...and southeastern New York.
